summary: Completed comprehensive testing of investment tracking application. Backend APIs mostly functional (86.7% success), frontend UI working well with professional dark theme. Core CRUD operations, navigation, and integration working correctly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 520 error when fetching crypto prices
flaky_endpoints.impact: Crypto price display shows '...' instead of current values
flaky_endpoints.note: Expected due to Binance API regional restrictions mentioned in context

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 520 error when fetching coin prices via scraping
flaky_endpoints.impact: Coin price display shows '...' instead of scraped values
flaky_endpoints.note: Expected for test URLs, real URLs may work

ui_bugs.issue: DOM elements become stale after form submissions causing 'Element not attached to DOM' errors
ui_bugs.note: Functionality works but may cause issues in automated testing

passed_tests: Stock price fetching via Yahoo Finance
All three tabs (Crypto, Actions, Pi√®ces) functional
Add coin form with URL/CSS selector
Overview cards displaying values in EUR
History page navigation and chart display
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider implementing fallback pricing for crypto when Binance API fails (e.g., CoinGecko API). The DOM staleness issue in frontend could be resolved by re-querying elements after form submissions.
